document.full_text: a dearborn, michigan jury will consider on friday whether a controversial florida pastor will have to post a "peace bond" before a planned demonstration in front of the largest mosque in the united states.
document.title: michigan jury to weigh mosque protest bid
lines_and_colors: a dearborn, michigan jury will consider on friday whether a controversial florida pastor will have to post a "peace bond" before a planned demonstration in front of the largest mosque in the united states.
